medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset of right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptom began acutely around 7pm with sharp, squeezing pain under the right ribs. Patient experienced 2 episodes of vomiting associated with the pain, which was non-bloody and non-bilious. There were 2 previous episodes of similar pain in the past month, both of which resolved spontaneously and were milder than the current episode.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Appendicitis; past surgical history includes appendectomy and tonsillectomy.
